CLUE: Annelid worm, used in medicine of old
Turkish dynasty or long cushioned seat
FOUND IN: Ottoman (also a term for the empire and furniture style)
Ruler (not just for length, but figuratively too)
Ivan I (Ivan Simeonovich) (Known as Kalita - 'the Moneybag', he was one of the early princes of Moscow but not traditionally called tsar by historians.)
Sputnik (the first artificial Earth satellite by USSR)
